channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car has been parked outside 103/105 Nightingale Lane, 25th November
item.description:
The car has been parked in a bay since the weekend. It has been circulated to a neighbour Whatsapp Group and it is not known to all parties. There is a 12noon to 2pm visitors parking requirement and no ticket is visible. Contact has been made with the Police and it is not of interest to them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nightingale Lane, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: SAFETY: Dangerous hole in the footpath, 25th November
item.description:
There is a deep hole in the footpath in Nevada Street You will see it is large enough to trap an adults foot Consequences of "falling into the hole" ranges from tissue damage to potential for broken limb, or worse

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Nevada Street, Greenwich

item.title: Abandoned overloaded lorry, 25th November
item.description:
This heavily laden lorry has been parked on the bend of Lynton Mead N20 for weeks or maybe months. It obstructs the view for drivers and could be dangerous if the load comes loose.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 98, Lynton Mead, Woodside Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle blocking public pavement, 25th November
item.description:
Vehicle is blocking the pavement so that anyone will need to walk on a busy street in order to get by the vehicle. It is dangerous for all pedestrians, but especially elderly or people with pushchairs and children. When buses arrive you cannot pass at all

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Albion Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
